ingredients.content: 14 ½ oz canned diced tomatoes, undrained
28 oz chicken breasts, air-chilled, boneless and skinless, cut into strips (½ in.)

preparations.content: Place tomatoes, olive oil and sugar into mixing bowl. Place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Add chicken, crème fraîche, curry powder, salt and cayenne. Mix well with spatula, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>10 min/212°F//speed 0.5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Distribute over each tortilla some arugula leaves, 1-2 tbsp chicken curry mixture and pineapple slices. Sprinkle with cilantro and serve immediately.
